translation.title: O'zingizni mahsulotlaringizni qoldiring
translation.desc: Eng yangi ingredientlar bilan mazali taom tayyorlash uchun tashqariga chiqmasdan yangi oziq-ovqat mahsulotlarini onlayn xarid qiling

translation.title: Buy your groceries
translation.desc: Get fresh groceries online without leaving your house, using the latest ingredients to create your own delicious meals
